import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useNavigation } from 'react-navi' import { createOne } from '../api/message.api' type Inputs = { firstName: string lastName: string email: string message: string } const Contact: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const navigation = useNavigation() const [{ firstname, lastname, email, message }, setRegisterData] = useState({ firstname: '', lastname: '', email: '', message: '', }) const onSubmit: (data: Inputs) => void = (data: Inputs) => { console.log('data', data) createOne({ firstname, lastname, email, message, }).then(() => { console.log('ok') }) navigation.navigate('/success').then(() => { console.log('ok') }) } return (

Contact

setRegisterData({ firstname: event.target.value, lastname, email, message, }) } className="appearance-none block w-full text-gray-700 border border-gray-400 rounded py-3 px-4 leading-tight focus:outline-none focus:bg-white focus:border-gray-700" placeholder="First name" type="text" id="firstName" name="firstName" ref={register({ required: true })} /> {errors.firstName && errors.firstName.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.lastName && errors.lastName.type === 'required' && ( )}
{errors.email && errors.email.type === 'required' && ( )}
